subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Luke Hochevar, the overall No. 1 pick of the 2006 draft, agreed to a one-year deal with the Kansas City Royals that will pay him $1.76 million.
snippet: Luke Hochevar, the overall No. 1 pick of the 2006 draft, agreed to a one-year deal with the Kansas City Royals that will pay him $1.76 million.
